QuestionTextEnglish: Stress: "How often is stress a problem for you in handling everyday things such as your health, money, work, or relationships with family and friends?"

QuestionTextEnglish: Moves in and out of bed or chair unassisted. Machanical transfer aide are acceptable

ResponseEnglish.Response: 2 = Able to do with help or supervision from another person

QuestionTextEnglish: Peripheral arterial disease (PAD) or Aortic Plaque

CategoryDescription: In this section the patient is asked questions about his mental health status and mood.
QuestionTextArabic: هل تفضل البقاء في المنزل على الخروج والقيام بأشياء جديدة؟
QuestionTextEnglish: Do you prefer to stay at home, rather than going out and doing new things?

CategoryDescription: In this section, the presence of familiarity with diseases of concern is investigated through a specific set of questions.
QuestionTextArabic: هل يمكث مع المريض  فرد من الأسرة من الدرجة الأولى (أم ، أب ، أخت ، أخ) لديه تاريخ من مرض السكري او  إقفار عضلة القلب  ، أو السكتة الدماغية أو القولون أو سرطان الثديقبل بلوغ سن الستين عاما؟
QuestionTextEnglish: Does the patient have a 1st-degree family member (mother, father, sister, brother) with a history of DM, IHD before age of 60 years old, Stroke, Colon, or Breast cancer?
SkipInstructions: Yes: if "No family history of DM, IHD before age 60, Stroke, Colon, or Breast Cancer," go to "MHS001.00.01"

CategoryDescription: In this section, the presence of familiarity with diseases of concern is investigated through a specific set of questions.

QuestionTextEnglish: Do you have any health problems that require you to limit your activities  in eating, getting dresses, grooming, bathing, walking, toileting (ADL)?
SkipInstructions: Yes, If "No" then move to Question "FPD006.00.01"

QuestionTextEnglish: Bathes self completely or needs help in bathing only a single part of the body such as the back, genital area or disabled extremity

ResponseArabic.Response: 2 = وزن طبيعي - مثالي صحي (مؤشر كتلة الجسم 18.5-24.9)
4 = سمنة من الدرجة الأولى - سمنة معتدلة (مؤشر كتلة الجسم 30.0-34.9)
5 = سمنة من الدرجة الثانية - سمنة شديدة (مؤشر كتلة الجسم 35.0-39.9)
6 = سمنة من الدرجة الثالثة - سمنة شديدة جدًا (مؤشر كتلة الجسم ≥ 40.0)

ResponseEnglish.Response: 6 = Class III Obesity - Very Severly Obese ( BMI ≥ 40.0)

3 = قادر على القيام بالأنشطة على نحو مستقل

ResponseEnglish.Response: 2 = Able to do with help or supervision from another person

CategoryDescription: In this section, the presence of health conditions is reported according to the presence of diagnostic criteria.

In this category, general questions on functional status and disability are posed. If some limitations in performing daily activities are retrieved, additional and more detailed questions on the activities of daily living are raised.
QuestionTextArabic: يحصل على الطعام من الطبق إلى الفم بدون مساعدة. يمكن أن يقوم شخص آخر بتحضير الطعام
QuestionTextEnglish: Gets food from plate into mouth without help. Preparation of food may be done by another person

3 = قادر على القيام بالأنشطة على نحو مستقل

QuestionTextEnglish: Health Status Perception (health attitude):"In general, Compared to others of your age, during the last 30 days, how would you rate your overall health? Would you say

QuestionTextEnglish: History of Stroke and TIA (STIA) or other Tromboembolism

QuestionTextEnglish: Presence of Hearing Disability (or Hearing Loss)

In this section the patient is asked questions about his mental health status and mood.
QuestionTextArabic: هل حالتك المعنوية جيدة في معظم الأوقات؟
QuestionTextEnglish: Are you in good spirits most of the time?

CategoryDescription: In this section the patient is asked questions about his mental health status and mood.
QuestionTextArabic: هل تشعر أن لديك مشاكل في الذاكرة؟
QuestionTextEnglish: Do you feel you have more problems with memory than most?

CategoryDescription: In this section, the presence of health conditions is reported according to the presence of diagnostic criteria.
QuestionTextArabic: هل تم تشخيص حالة المريض بأي حالة صحية؟
QuestionTextEnglish: Is the patient diagnosed with any health condition?
SkipInstructions: Yes: if "Patient doesn't suffer any health condition," go to "FPD001.00.01"
QuestionInstructionsHints: Based on the patient history and assessment, What are the health conditions the patient is CURRENTLY diagnosed with?
